12 class ColorMap {
13  public:
14  ColorMap() : min_value_(0.0), max_value_(1.0) {}
15  virtual ~ColorMap() {}
16 
17  void setMinValue(float min_value) { min_value_ = min_value; }
18 
19  void setMaxValue(float max_value) { max_value_ = max_value; }
20 
21  virtual Color colorLookup(float value) const = 0;
22 
23  protected:
24  float min_value_;
25  float max_value_;
26 };
27 
28 class GrayscaleColorMap : public ColorMap {
29  public:
30  virtual Color colorLookup(float value) const {
31  float new_value = std::min(max_value_, std::max(min_value_, value));
32  new_value = (new_value - min_value_) / (max_value_ - min_value_);
33  return grayColorMap(new_value);
34  }
35 };
36 
37 class InverseGrayscaleColorMap : public ColorMap {
38  public:
39  virtual Color colorLookup(float value) const {
40  float new_value = std::min(max_value_, std::max(min_value_, value));
41  new_value = (new_value - min_value_) / (max_value_ - min_value_);
42  return grayColorMap(1.0 - new_value);
43  }
44 };
45 
46 class RainbowColorMap : public ColorMap {
47  public:
48  virtual Color colorLookup(float value) const {
49  float new_value = std::min(max_value_, std::max(min_value_, value));
50  new_value = (new_value - min_value_) / (max_value_ - min_value_);
51  return rainbowColorMap(new_value);
52  }
53 };
54 
55 class InverseRainbowColorMap : public ColorMap {
56  public:
57  virtual Color colorLookup(float value) const {
58  float new_value = std::min(max_value_, std::max(min_value_, value));
59  new_value = (new_value - min_value_) / (max_value_ - min_value_);
60  return rainbowColorMap(1.0 - new_value);
61  }
62 };
63 
64 class IronbowColorMap : public ColorMap {
65  public:
66  IronbowColorMap() : ColorMap() {
67  palette_colors_.push_back(Color(0, 0, 0));
68  palette_colors_.push_back(Color(145, 20, 145));
69  palette_colors_.push_back(Color(255, 138, 0));
70  palette_colors_.push_back(Color(255, 230, 40));
71  palette_colors_.push_back(Color(255, 255, 255));
72  // Add an extra to avoid overflow.
73  palette_colors_.push_back(Color(255, 255, 255));
74 
75  increment_ = 1.0 / (palette_colors_.size() - 2);
76  }
77 
78  virtual Color colorLookup(float value) const {
79  float new_value = std::min(max_value_, std::max(min_value_, value));
80  new_value = (new_value - min_value_) / (max_value_ - min_value_);
81 
82  size_t index = static_cast<size_t>(std::floor(new_value / increment_));
83 
84  return Color::blendTwoColors(
85  palette_colors_[index], increment_ * (index + 1) - new_value,
86  palette_colors_[index + 1], new_value - increment_ * (index));
87  }
88 
89  protected:
90  std::vector<Color> palette_colors_;
91  float increment_;
92 };
93
